name: calcium chloride to generic market for de-icer | de-icer | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/17927/documentation

This activity links the byproduct calcium chloride to the generic market for de-icer. ; All chemicals that enter this market provide the function of a de-icer.;When the use of methanol is mandatory, this will be obtained from the market for methanol. In such case, the user will be accessing a niche market, because it defines specific product features aimed at satisfying specific market needs. When there are no specific product attributes to be fulfilled, these will be satisfied in the generic market. In the generic market the consumption of one product over another wil only be driven by best available price and not by the product attributes.
category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals
